name: Amexio Dropdown
description: Drop-Down component has been created to render N numbers of drop-down items based on data-set configured. Data-set can be configured using HTTP call OR Define fix number of dropdown-items. User can configure different attributes for enabling filter, multi-select, maximum selection in case of multi select.

properties.name: data-reader
properties.description: Key in JSON datasource for records

properties.name: display-field
properties.description: Name of key inside response data to display on ui.

properties.name: value-field
properties.description: Name of key inside response data.use to send to backend

events.name: onSingleSelect
events.description: Fire when drop down item selected.

events.name: onMultiSelect
events.description: Fire when multiple record select in drop down.this event is only applied when multi-select=true

events.name: onClick
events.description: On record select event.this event is only for normal dropdown.
